comment: "The only reason I got paid, after 13+ emails went ignored & unanswered by AP, was a legal letter threatening action if I was not paid within a week. Hey presto, the money appeared. Strongly discourage anyone from risking working with this publication."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "Accounting department did not answer repeated emails about issuing payment until I pressed them. Very difficult to gain clarity on when would be paid."
